pr_title: [#1391] Allow easy configuration of Snapshot Filter

timeline.message:
Introduce SnapshotFilter

Introduce the SnapshotFilter functional interface, providing an And, Or
and Negate implementation for convenience. The SnapshotFilter will be
used as the unit to provide to the AggregateConfigurer or as a bean in
the application context, referenced through the @Aggregate
annotation.

#1391

Allow configuration of a SnapshotFilter on the AggregateConfigurer

Allow configuration of a SnapshotFilter on the AggregateConfigurer
through a dedicated method. Added, provide a means to retrieve the
SnapshotFilter from the AggregateConfiguration, so that it can be
provisioned to the EventStorageEngine. Added, fix some warnings and
indentation issues

#1391

Provide builder options for the SnapshotFilter on the storage engines

All (non in memory) storage engines should allow for setting the
SnapshotFilter. This should replace the old SnapshotFilter, which used
a plain Predicate. The AbstractEventStorageEngine implementation should
use the filter when reading snapshots. Finally, adjust the documentation
 accordingly, with added deprecation for the old snapshot filter builder
 methods.

#1391

Set the configured SnapshotFilter on the storage engines

A combined SnapshotFilter needs to be retrieved from the Configuration,
which traverses all existing AggregateConfigurers and combines them in
an AND operation. The SnapshotFilter should be provided to the right
places in the configurers to be added to the storage engines.

#1391

Allow configuration of SnapshotFilter bean on the @Aggregate

The @Aggregate annotation should include a snapshotFilter property which
 will reference the SnapshotFilter bean name. The
 SpringAxonAutoConfigurer should search for the bean and tie it to the
 AggregateConfigurer. Added, clean up some of the code to simplify.

#1391

Add the SnapshotFilter to the jdbc/jpa auto configuration classes

Add the SnapshotFilter to the jdbc/jpa auto configuration classes.
Provide a test case which validates the overall Spring auto
configuration.

#1391

Add the SnapshotFilter to the axon server auto configuration class

Add the SnapshotFilter to the axon server auto configuration class.

#1391

Rename test class and add javadoc line

Rename test class and add javadoc line for clarity

#1391

Adjust SnapshotFilter API

Change the SnapshotFilter API to be more to the point. In doing so,
rename `filter` to `allow`, as the function should allow or reject
snapshot data. On top, only the `and` operation is used, which logically
 should be `combine`, as you'd combine these allow methods, not "and"
 them.
